chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
instr: Set
data: Type
one_step: instr -> state -> state -> Prop
sss_fun: forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2
sss_dec: forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2}
P: code
p: nat
s2: state
s1: state

Goal:
sss_step_stall P s1 -> P//s1-[p]->s2 -> p = 0 /\ s1 = s2

Premises:
Notation state := (nat * data)%type
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
sss_step_stall = fun (P : code) (st : state) => forall st' : state, ~ P // st :1> st' : code -> state -> Prop
Notation code := (nat * list instr)%type
Tauto.N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type] ?TX : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
Tauto.X : ?TX -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type] ?TX : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type] ?TX : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
Tauto.D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type] ?TX : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
VectorSpec.cons_inj : VectorDef.cons ?A ?a1 ?n ?v1 = VectorDef.cons ?A ?a2 ?n ?v2 -> ?a1 = ?a2 /\ ?v1 = ?v2 where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- VectorDef.t ?A ?n]
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type] ?TX : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
VectorDef.append : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> VectorDef.t ?A ?p -> VectorDef.t ?A (?n + ?p) where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type] ?n : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- nat]
ssrbool.is_left : {?A} + {?B} -> bool where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Prop] ?B : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Prop]
VectorDef.hd : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n) -> ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type] ?n : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- nat]
VectorDef.tl : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n) -> VectorDef.t ?A ?n where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type] ?n : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (vw : VectorDef.t ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v w where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (a : ?A), VectorDef.cons ?A a (?n + ?m) (VectorDef.append v w) = VectorDef.append (VectorDef.cons ?A a ?n v) w where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- nat]
VarMap.Empty : VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
EnvRing.PEc : ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
EnvRing.PEX : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
VarMap.Elt : ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
out_code : nat -> subcode.code ?X -> Prop where ?X : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
EnvRing.Pinj : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
EnvRing.PEmul : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
EnvRing.PEadd : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
EnvRing.PX : EnvRing.Pol ?C -> BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
subcode : subcode.code ?X -> nat * list ?X -> Prop where ?X : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (l + r) -> VectorDef.t ?A l * VectorDef.t ?A r where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1 : state s2 : state |- Type]
subcode_sss_terminates_instr : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P // st2 ↓ -> P // st1 ↓
subcode_sss_compute_instr : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (st1 st2 st3 : state), st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P // st2 -> > st3 -> P // st1 -> > st3
sss_step = fun (P : code) (st1 st2 : state) => exists (k : nat) (l : list instr) (i : instr) (r : list instr) (d : data), P = (k, l ++ i :: r) /\ st1 = (k + length l, d) /\ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 : code -> state -> state -> Prop
in_sss_step : forall (k : nat) (l : list instr) (i : instr) (r : list instr) (st1 st2 : state), fst st1 = k + length l -> st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> (k, l ++ i :: r) // st1 :1> st2
sss_step_fun : forall (P : code) (s t1 t2 : state), P // s :1> t1 -> P // s :1> t2 -> t1 = t2
sss_stall = fun (ii : instr) (st : state) => forall st' : state, ~ st ⟬ ii ⦒ st' : instr -> state -> Prop
sss_step_subcode_inv : forall (P : code) (ii : instr) (st st' : state), (fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P -> P // st :1> st' -> st ⟬ ii ⦒ st'
sss_steps_fun : forall (P : code) (k : nat) (s t1 t2 : state), P//s-[k] -> t1 -> P//s-[k] -> t2 -> t1 = t2
ZifyClasses.or_morph : forall s1 s2 t1 t2 : Prop, s1 < -> t1 -> s2 < -> t2 -> s1 \/ s2 < -> t1 \/ t2
sss_steps_ind : forall (P : code) (P0 : nat -> state -> state -> Prop), (forall st : state, P0 0 st st) -> (forall (n : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : state), P // st1 :1> st2 -> P//st2-[n]->st3 -> P0 n st2 st3 -> P0 (S n) st1 st3) -> forall (n : nat) (p p0 : state), P//p-[n] -> p0 -> P0 n p p0
sss_steps_sind : forall (P : code) (P0 : nat -> state -> state -> SProp), (forall st : state, P0 0 st st) -> (forall (n : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : state), P // st1 :1> st2 -> P//st2-[n]->st3 -> P0 n st2 st3 -> P0 (S n) st1 st3) -> forall (n : nat) (p p0 : state), P//p-[n] -> p0 -> P0 n p p0
ZifyClasses.mkrel : forall (S T : Type) (R : S -> S -> Prop) (I : S -> T) (TR : T -> T -> Prop), (forall n m : S, R n m <-> TR (I n) (I m)) -> forall (s1 : S) (t1 : T), I s1 = t1 -> forall (s2 : S) (t2 : T), I s2 = t2 -> R s1 s2 < -> TR t1 t2
ZifyClasses.mkapp2 : forall (S1 S2 S3 T : Type) (Op : S1 -> S2 -> S3) (I1 : S1 -> T) (I2 : S2 -> T) (I3 : S3 -> T) (TBOP : T -> T -> T), (forall (n : S1) (m : S2), I3 (Op n m) = TBOP (I1 n) (I2 m)) -> forall (s1 : S1) (t1 : T), I1 s1 = t1 -> forall (s2 : S2) (t2 : T), I2 s2 = t2 -> I3 (Op s1 s2) = TBOP t1 t2
ZifyClasses.not_morph : forall s1 t1 : Prop, s1 < -> t1 -> ~ s1 < -> ~ t1
